Annotation.String: This is the schema definition for the AirHandlingUnit Metrics.
This resource shall be used to represent a cooling metrics resource for a Redfish implementation.
Cooling properties can be updated to change limits, exceptions and other writable properties.
The actual ID of AirHandlingUnit.
This property shall indicate the actual ID of AirHandlingUnit.
The actual Name of AirHandlingUnit.
This property shall indicate the actual Name of AirHandlingUnit.
The actual Firmware Revision of AirHandlingUnit.
This property shall indicate the actual Firmware Rev of AirHandlingUnit.
